Html: The Prism v4 distribution contains a version of both Microsoft.Expression.Drawing.dll and Microsoft.Expression.Interactions.dll.  However, it lacks the Design folder found in the Blend SDK.  The Prism version of these assemblies bear the same file version as the Blend SDK, but a different modification date.  Due to the difference it's not clear to me that I can simply drop in the design assemblies from the Blend SDK.  Could you please update the distribution with the relevant design assemblies?  Without Prism is missing some essential functionality.

Hi,

I´ve checked the assemblies’ versions and last modified dates and confirmed that they differ with the ones provided with Blend SDK. However, the version number for each file is the same. This is likely to indicate that no new features or bug fixing was done between those dates.

On the other hand, if you experience any kind of issues related to this, you can create a work item in the Issue Tracker.

Thanks,

Miguel Bronzovic
http://blogs.southworks.net/mbronzovic
